metadata.synopsis: PAD onliner that triggers when players attack a canopic jar without using the right damage type for the first time. Doing this causes the jar to counterattack dealing necrotic damage.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Debugbook -> quest flags -> act 3 -> Philgrave's Mansion -> get objects -> get jars2) Attack it with anything other than fire

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Wasn't expecting that. This jar fights back.
